last_episode_to_air.name: Model 108
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kenta wrestles with a brutal choice and the Terminator reveals a shocking truth as the future of humankind hangs in the balance.

name: Terminator Zero
overview: A warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels to 1997 to protect an AI scientist being hunted by an unfeeling — and indestructible — cyborg.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: 2022: A future war has raged for decades between the few human survivors and an endless army of machines. 1997: The AI known as Skynet gained self-awareness and began its war against humanity. Caught between the future and this past is a soldier sent back in time to change the fate of humanity. She arrives in 1997 to protect a scientist named Malcolm Lee who works to launch a new AI system designed to compete with Skynet's impending attack on humanity. As Malcolm navigates the moral complexities of his creation, he is hunted by an unrelenting assassin from the future which forever alters the fate of his three children.

episodes.name: Model 101
episodes.overview: In 1997, a haunted scientist brushes his family aside for an all-consuming project. In 2022, a renegade fighter battles a powerful robot for vital data.

episodes.name: Model 102
episodes.overview: Eiko and the Terminator arrive in 1997 with identical missions: find Dr. Malcolm Lee. Meanwhile, Lee's three children sneak out of their apartment.

episodes.name: Model 103
episodes.overview: Malcolm confides in Kokoro about his recurring nightmare. The three children continue their underground trek, unaware of looming danger.

episodes.name: Model 104
episodes.overview: As a desperate Eiko attempts to elude the police, Misaki's mysterious past comes into focus. Malcolm wrestles with the nature of fate.

episodes.name: Model 105
episodes.overview: Malcolm brings Kokoro online. The boys disagree about Misaki's motivations. Eiko realizes she's entering unknown territory.

episodes.name: Model 106
episodes.overview: The Prophet debates the paradox of time travel with Eiko. Malcolm shares a painful memory with Kokoro as the children hope to reunite at Cat Town.

episodes.name: Model 107
episodes.overview: Malcolm recalls past efforts to thwart the machines — and his desire to build a god. With Kenta captured, the Terminator prepares for the endgame.

guest_stars.character: Malcolm Lee (7 years old / 13 years old) (voice)
guest_stars.name: Miyuki Satou
